description:
Chinook Salmon and steelhead smolt production is estimated annually using fish passage data collected at LGR. Passage data consist of daily counts of wild smolts and estimated by dividing the daily count by estimated collection efficiency for that day. Daily numbers of wild Chinook Salmon and steelhead smolts collected at LGR are obtained from the Fish Passage Center website. The estimated daily smolt collection efficiencies at LGT are provided by project 199302900. Efficiencies are estimated as detailed in Sandford and Smith (2002) and are not typically available until January of the following year. Daily abundance estimates were summed for the year. In collaboration with the Genetic Stock Identification project (2010-026-00), we will apportion the aggregate abundance estimates and age composition into genetic stocks. Over time, productivity will be assessed.

Efficiency of the bypass system at Lower Granite Dam will be estimated for the contract year. We will estimate the number of unclipped Chinook Salmon and steelhead smolts bypassing Lower Granite Dam during the contract year
